publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-3736 Dr Rabinder Buttar, Founder of Clin Tech International (lodged on 18 March 2009) Ken Macintosh*, Cathie Craigie*, Sandra White*

S3M-3736 David Whitton: Dr Rabinder Buttar, Founder of ClinTech International—That the Parliament congratulates Dr Rabinder Buttar, founder of clinical research company ClinTech International and entrepreneur from Bishopbriggs in East Dunbartonshire, on being named in Real Business magazine as one of the top 100 most entrepreneurial women in the United Kingdom and recognises the contribution that Dr Rabinder Buttar and ClinTech have made to Scotland’s pharmaceutical industry by providing teams of research staff across the globe. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell, Elaine Murray, Ross Finnie, Des McNulty, Trish Godman, Stuart McMillan, Helen Eadie, John Park, Bill Kidd, Mr Frank McAveety, Hugh Henry, Ken Macintosh, Cathie Craigie, Sandra White
S3M-3736 Dr Rabinder Buttar, Founder of ClinTech International (lodged on 18 March 2009) Mary Mulligan*, Jack McConnell*
